name: Touhou: HCER
description:
A small maze game done under 72 hours for the 2th Touhou Game Jam

Youmu's ghost half is lost in a maze! Help her find her way back to her human half.

But be careful, as the ghost's movement retains its inertia and touching any wall of the maze will result in a game over.

Will you manage to find the 3 secret levels?

Controls:

(Menu) Enter - Accept

(Menu) Esc - Return

Left Click - Accelerate towards mouse pointer

Right Click - Brake

Mouse Wheel - Zoom in/out

Shift - Show hitbox

M - Mute music
